Experience

Doctoral Researcher

Brest, France
2016 to Present

Study and analyse of the relationship between syntax and semantics for french utterances based on Combinatory Categoral Grammar, in order to apply to building a semantic representation for French language with Discourse Representation Theory.

Lecturer

Dalat University, Viet Nam
2011 to 2019

Teaching for the first year students with the course "Information Technology fundamentals" and the courses in the software engineering domain such as "Java Programming", "Web Development", "Algorithm and Data Structure".

Software Engineer

Freelance
2011 to 2013

Design and implementation of web-based and Window-based applications according to the requirements of organisations and companies at Da Lat city by using .NET frameworks with C#, ASP.NET and SQL.

Master Intership

Montpelier, France
April 2015 to Octobare 2015

Study and developpment of a knowledge system for big data: application to phenotyping data of rice (O.Sativa) based on semantic web technology with RDF data formats, ontologies in association with big data management systems such as MongoDB and Neo4j.
